head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HILL, HARRY G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HILL, HARRY G.

block.p: HILL-Harry G. Age 99, on September 26, 2000 of Garden City, NY. Beloved husband of the late Grace M. (Byrne). Loving father of Harry G., Jr., David B. and Sister Elizabeth A., C.S.J. Cherished grandfather of seven grandchildren. Member of the firm of Cullen and Dykman for over 50 years. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Avenue at 12th Street, Garden City, NY 2-4 and 7-9 PM Thursday. Mass of Christian burial St. Joseph's Church, Garden City, NY, 11 AM Friday. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury.
